column17:
Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2305

Key Features

  • With Fragrance of Soft Citruses (Nectarine and Bergamot) and Woody (Rosewood) and a Touch of Lavender
  • Aroma of Orchid and Patchouli
  • Blend of Cedar White Amber Woods and Musk
  • Soft Powdery Discrete and Very Intimate Fragrance

An enthralling scent made by layering together a range of natural extracts Lovely by Sarah Jessica Parker hits the mark. This luxury scent is inspired from the unsung loveliness of the everyday which we seem to forget all too soon. Soft and powdery this Eau de Parfum is the creation of Laurent Le Guernec and Clement Gavarry for the trendsetting brand of Sarah Jessica Parker.

An intoxicating top note that folds together light and soothing lavender ripe mandarin orange sweet hints of bergamot and the unique woody and floral scent of brazilian rosewood with a touch of apple martini. Following this is an intriguing heart note that marries earthy patchouli floral notes of orchid and the distinctly sweet scent of paperwhites. An enchanting base note mixes together woody notes of cedar hints of sultry wood distinct musk and touches of white amber. The fragrance spreads a warm and comforting air with its strong musky undertone. The bottle flaunts a delicate craftsmanship gently resembling the shape of a teardrop. A light pink hue bathes the bottle in an unapologetic feminine charm along with gold accents and lettering. A clear ribbed cap with a grosgrain ribbon tied onto the neck lends the bottle a pretty and graceful charm. Lovely folds you in a vibrant aura that opens you up to the beauty all around.
